New Records: Keider Montero threw a complete game shutout
Key Match Events: Detroit Tigers won the first game of the series against Colorado Rockies
Pre-Game Insights: A.J. Hinch spoke about Montero’s impact on the team down the stretch
Post-Match Reflections: Keider Montero expressed pride and happiness for his performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Montero's performance saved the Tigers’ bullpen from having to be used
Others: The win moves the Tigers closer to the final spot in the American League Wild Card
